description:
Our tempest test that sends extremely long metadata (>255 characters) 
fails on the latest trunk,

test_create_server_metadata_exceeds_length_limit  - Pass really long metadata while creating a server

The request json would contain metadata like so:

metadata = {'a': 'b' * 260}

This raises the expected error "413 OverLimit" on stable/essex but on trunk, it returns 400 BadRequest.

For this use case, the response error code should be consistent and be 413Overlimit.
title: Incorrect Exception raised during Create server when metadata over 255 characters

If this package fixes the bug for you, please add a comment to this bug, mentioning the version of the package you tested, and change the tag from verification-needed to verification-done. If it does not fix the bug for you, please add a comment stating that, and change the tag to verification-failed.  In either case, details of your testing will help us make a better decision.

Further information regarding the verification process can be found at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/QATeam/PerformingSRUVerification .  Thank you in advance!
